title: Dragon Wings
description: Cyan a half dragon half/elf hybrid was rescued from a life of slavery, he ends up at haven the school for magical beings. naturally submissive cy is scared of his new found freedom. can he find some happiness in his new life? Tamas a mid strength empath, was called to him by cyan's distress, he will do all he can to help cyan in his new life even if that means owning him.Warning: BDSM! and M/MAlso found: here
